description: Let N(k) and D(k) be the sequences defined in A054765 and A012244; write N(k)* D(k+j ) - N(k+j)*D(k) = (-1)^(k+1)*(k!)^2*P(k) where P(k) is a polynomial in k of degree j-1; sequence gives coefficients of expansion of P(k) in powers of k for j=1,2,3,...
links: K. S. Brown, Integer Sequences Related To PI
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 26 2000
extensions: Sign corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Jul 13 2013
